duties_responsibilities.duty: Become proficient with data center operations, including room layouts, MDF’s/IDF’s, UPS & Non-UPS power, breakers, batteries, AC units, generators, fire systems, VESDA advanced smoke detection, and Site Scan/Alber.

Pro-actively perform walkthroughs and routine physical inspections of data center rooms and generators, accountable for daily data center health checks, and handle infrastructure issues with infrastructure teams and vendors.
Maintain daily batch scheduling using Control-M, coordinate exceptions, and critical activities outside of normal processes, and react to issues and concerns appropriately.

Maintain data center physical security and policies, execute Rapid Response process, and ensure visibility of environment health and system schedules, providing holistic status of operational performance.
Improve accuracy and quality of information provided on daily briefing calls, participate in daily briefing calls, post-call discussions, and demonstrate understanding of the issues discussed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
